# Background

## Two types of machine learning

<br/>

:::{.column width="49%"}

### Supervised

- Labeled data
- Predict an outcome
- Learners
- Risk prediction

:::{.column width="49%"}

### Unsupervised

- Unlabeled data
- Find structure
- Clusters
- Organize medical records
